newsitem.title: USA: Pilgrim's says grain prices to aid results.
newsitem.headline: Pilgrim's says grain prices to aid results.

text.p: Pilgrim's Pride Corp said on Wednesday that lower grain prices will help its results for fiscal 1997.

"The continuation of present sales markets and reducing grain prices will have a continuing favorable effect on our fiscal 1997 bottom line," vice chairman and executive vice president Clifford Butler said in a statement.
Pilgrim's Pride, which reported a first quarter profit compared with a loss in the year ago period, cited higher chicken prices in Mexico and a decrease in feed ingredient prices as helping results.
